_plugin.PLUGIN_DESC: Shows the plugins you have installed.

admin.BAN_DESC: Ban someone in the group. Reply to message or tag a person to use command.
admin.IM_NOT_ADMIN: *I am not admin in this group!*
admin.ALREADY_PROMOTED: ```How can I make someone admin who is already admin?```
admin.DEMOTE_DESC: Takes the authority of any admin.
admin.ALREADY_NOT_ADMIN: ```How can I make someone admin who is already admin?```
admin.MUTE_DESC: Mute the group chat. Only the admins can send a message.
admin.UNMUTE_DESC: Unmute the group chat. Anyone can send a message.

afk.AFK_DESC: It makes you AFK - Away From Keyboard.
afk.AFK_TEXT: ```Bip bop! This is a bot. My owner is not here at the moment.```
afk.AFK_TEXT_NOMD: Bip bop! This is a bot.

evaluators.TERM_DESC: Allows to run the command on the server's shell.

nekobin.NEKO_DESC: Replied messages will be added to nekobin.com.

filters.FILTER_DESC: It adds a filter. If someone writes your filter, it send the answer. If you just write .filter, it show's your filter list.
filters.NO_FILTER: *‚ùå There are no filters in this chat!*
filters.FILTERS: *üîé There is your filters in this chat:*
filters.STOP_DESC: Stops the filter you added previously.
filters.ALREADY_NO_FILTER: *‚ùå There is already no filter like this!*

greetings.WELCOME_DESC: It sets the welcome message. If you leave it blank it shows the welcome message.
greetings.NOT_SET_WELCOME:
*You don't set the welcome message yet.!*
**To set:** ```.welcome your welcome message```
greetings.NEED_WELCOME_TEXT:
*You must write a message to set up the welcome message.*
*Example:* ```.welcome WELCOME!```
greetings.WELCOME_DELETED: *‚úÖ Welcome message has been deleted successfully!*
greetings.WELCOME_SETTED: *‚úÖ Welcome message has been set successfully!*
greetings.GOODBYE_DESC: Sets the goodbye message. If you leave blank, it show's the goodbye message.
greetings.NOT_SET_GOODBYE:
*You didn't set a goodbye message!*
*To set:* ```.goodbye Your Goodbye Message```
greetings.NEED_GOODBYE_TEXT:
*You must write a message to set up the goodbye message.*
*Example:* ```.goodbye Goodbye!```
greetings.GOODBYE_DELETED: *‚úÖ Goodbye message has been deleted successfully!*
greetings.GOODBYE_SETTED: *‚úÖ Goodbye message has been setted successfully!*

lydia.COFFEEHOUSE: ```You haven't defined the Coffehouse API Key! ```

lydia.RMLYDIA_DESC: Makes Lydia disabled for the user.
lydia.DISABLED: ```Lydia has been disabled for this user!```

clear.CLR_DESC: Clear all the messages From this Chat.

ocr.OCR_DESC: Reads the text on the photo you have replied.

profile.KICKME_DESC: It kicks you from the group you are using it in.

scrapers.IMG_DESC: Searches for related pics on Google.
